segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or really doesn’t see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s kind of funny how absorbed she is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, reaching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is one of those moments that’s going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just getting everywhere, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how clueless everyone seems.
segments.speaker: PAR
